name: Trash Blasta'
description:
Play as the world's Hero and blast the trash that has gained sentience and it rushing the last safe place on Earth! Destroy all the trash to win, but don't let them overwhelm you. You are Earth's last hope.

I had a lot of fun creating this. I was excited as it is my first game ever produced. I am aware there is only one sound and it's crappy. I ran out of time to add sounds haha. 

Instructions:

WASD to move

Space to jump

LMB to shoot

LeftShift to sprint
